title: How to Get Steam on a Macbook

steps.headline: Download CrossOver Games (Not CrossOver, CrossOver Games!
steps.description: It doesn't require an OS, as it's an emulator. It might still be available on Pirate Bay.)

steps.headline: It already has an option to install steam!
steps.description: Click in the CrossOver Games Software Installer.

text: Download CrossOver Games (Not CrossOver, CrossOver Games! It doesn't require an OS, as it's an emulator. It might still be available on Pirate Bay.) Install CrossOver Games.  It already has an option to install steam! Click in the CrossOver Games Software Installer. Install Steam.  Install your Steam games.  Play.
